A CSS Framework and a Set of Javascript Components

that Implement Google's Material Design

WIKI GITHUB

Beautifully designed

Clean, simple, and functional. Designed to work and display beautifully.

Fun to learn

All you need to know are HTML, CSS, and JavaScript: the building blocks of the web. You'll even learn AngularJS as you work.

UI Components

Build your entire site with one UI stack. Share your UI between multiple projects.

Built by nerds (like you)

Focuses on standards compliant code, and is managed through Github.

R eferences

semantic-ui, material-ui, Google Material Design, SlickGrid, bootstrap-material, jQuery, requirejs, bootstrap, Less, Gulp.js
